QuestData.Title: The Woods Have Eyes
QuestData.Description:
The sooner I can return the lady Waycrest to Highroad Gate the better, but I will honor her wishes if we can assure her safety.
There are dark things happening in these lands that you don't fully understand. If we must dally, then there are measures that need be taken.
First, the wildlife here can serve as eyes to dark powers. Kill them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Watchful Ravens and $2oa Darkmaw Prowlers in the Watchman's Wood.
QuestData.CompletionText: Has our foe been sufficiently blinded?
QuestData.RewardText:
Not a beast in sight. Good.
The foes of this land must not find us here in the open.
